short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integrates your network connected zebra printer with the HieCOR Software.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Paired with your HieCOR subscription, this application will allow you to integrate your zebra printer and print barcodes with the HieCOR application.
